summary: This mod adds two new glowing eyes to skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
Link to a video with all all the eye textures! Enjoy
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QCOBl1ENzI8&feature=plcp
Here\'s a link to my mod glowing eyes v3, it adds i more eye.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21232
Here\'s another of my mods.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20788
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Installation: (Have not tried to use mod manager to install, install manually recommended.)
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Drop both folders (meshes and textures) and Glowing Eyes.esp into your data folder.
Done!
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
If you wish to change the textures of the eyes you can edit them with gimp,
photoshop, etc, all you need is a plugin to open .dds files.
To edit the eyes you have to open, lets say dawneye.dds, to edit the glow,
open dawneye_g.dds.
Files located in \"data\\textures\\actors\\character\\eyes\"
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Have fun!!:D
author: dumle35
